comments.body: To make this heading consistent with the surrounding headings. It appears that all the other headings have white space both above and below. This heading only had whitespace above.

comments.body:
I think 
```
"`numpy.fft` promotes ``float32`` and ``complex64`` arrays to ``float64`` and
``complex128`` arrays respectively."
```

 reads better. Note also the double backticks needed for the dtypes.
